data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''+''' will prompt you into accessing [[explore mode]], a mode where you are able to come back to life. If the server or your [[rcfile]] disables it, the command does nothing.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''+''' represents a closed [[door]].

==History==
*This used to be command to automatically aim at the nearest valid target (its functionality was moved to [[p]]).
